## About

I am a postdoctoral researcher at [AgroParisTech](https://www.agroparistech.fr) in the Centre for International Research on Environment and Development ([CIRED](https://www.centre-cired.fr)).  
This [CLAND](https://cland.lsce.ipsl.fr)-funded position, supervised by [Thierry Brunelle](https://scholar.google.com), analyses maize intensification in Kenya and sub-Saharan Africa.  
My research interests are in development and agricultural economics.
